Dear Hagop,

 

Hope you are doing good !

 

Christofle Stock Through Put policy is due for renewal on 31st December 2024, since this is very specialised cover we would like to start the renewal process well in advance. 

 

Kindly share updated values of all locations including recently owned outlet in Japan.

 

Also arrange the actual turnover details for 2024 and estimated figures for 2025.

 

For your ready reference enclosing copies of the existing files in our records.

 

In addition to above also let us know if there are any material changes in operations or new acquisitions within this group.

 

Look forward to hearing from you.

 

Best Regards,

 

Uttam Khutale
Technical Manager – Agency

 



 

Nasco Gulf

Dear Hagop,

 

Hope you are doing good !

 

Christofle Stock Through Put policy is due for renewal on 31st December 2024, since this is very specialised cover we would like to start the renewal process well in advance. 

 

Kindly share updated values of all locations including recently owned outlet in Japan.

 

Also arrange the actual turnover details for 2024 and estimated figures for 2025.

 

For your ready reference enclosing copies of the existing files in our records.

Look forward to hearing from you.

 

Best Regards,

Subject: RENEWAL - M/s. M.C.T. FZE and/or M/s. Christofle ref. 82-SPL-2024-00001

 

Dear Hagop,

 

Hope you are doing good !

 

Christofle Stock Through Put policy is due for renewal on 31st December 2024, since this is very specialised cover we would like to start the renewal process well in advance. 

 

Kindly share updated values of all locations including recently owned outlet in Japan.

 

Also arrange the actual turnover details for 2024 and estimated figures for 2025.

 

For your ready reference enclosing copies of the existing files in our records.

 

In addition to above also let us know if there are any material changes in operations or new acquisitions within this group.

 

Look forward to hearing from you.

 

Best Regards,

 

Uttam Khutale
Technical Manager – Agency

 



 

Nasco Gulf

P.O. Box 26590, Dubai, UAE

Dear Hagop,

 

Hope you are doing good !

 

Christofle Stock Through Put policy is due for renewal on 31st December 2024, since this is very specialised cover we would like to start the renewal process well in advance. 

 

Kindly share updated values of all locations including recently owned outlet in Japan.

 

Also arrange the actual turnover details for 2024 and estimated figures for 2025.

 

For your ready reference enclosing copies of the existing files in our records.

 

In addition to above also let us know if there are any material changes in operations or new acquisitions within this group.

 

Look forward to hearing from you.

 

Best Regards,

 

Uttam Khutale

exhibition

 

In respect of Jewellery:

maximum single item limit of € 10,000 and one item and € 250,000 in the aggregate.

 

In respect of Bullion:

covered under the declared stock value, approximate value € 1 Million

 

Minimum & Deposit Premium (as per expiry): 

€ 60,020 for transit

€ 85,980 for storage

Total Minimum & Deposit Premium: € 146,000

Adjustable at the following Rates: 

0.1250% on transits subject to minimum premium

0.1772% on storage locations

Dear Hagop,

 

Hope you are doing good !

 

Christofle Stock Through Put policy is due for renewal on 31st December 2024, since this is very specialised cover we would like to start the renewal process well in advance. 

 

Kindly share updated values of all locations including recently owned outlet in Japan.

 

Also arrange the actual turnover details for 2024 and estimated figures for 2025.

 

For your ready reference enclosing copies of the existing files in our records.

 

In addition to above also let us know if there are any material changes in operations or new acquisitions within this group.

 

Look forward to hearing from you.

 

Best Regards,

 

Uttam Khutale
Technical Manager – Agency

P.O. Box 26590, Dubai, UAE

Dear Hagop,

 

Hope you are doing good !

 

Christofle Stock Through Put policy is due for renewal on 31st December 2024, since this is very specialised cover we would like to start the renewal process well in advance. 

 

Kindly share updated values of all locations including recently owned outlet in Japan.

 

Also arrange the actual turnover details for 2024 and estimated figures for 2025.

 

For your ready reference enclosing copies of the existing files in our records.

 

In addition to above also let us know if there are any material changes in operations or new acquisitions within this group.

 

Look forward to hearing from you.

 

Best Regards,

 

Uttam Khutale
Technical Manager – Agency

 



 

Nasco Gulf

P.O. Box 26590, Dubai, UAE

Christofle Stock Through Put policy is due for renewal on 31st December 2024, since this is very specialised cover we would like to start the renewal process well in advance.

Dear Hagop,

 

Hope you are doing good !

 

Christofle Stock Through Put policy is due for renewal on 31st December 2024, since this is very specialised cover we would like to start the renewal process well in advance. 

 

Kindly share updated values of all locations including recently owned outlet in Japan.

 

Also arrange the actual turnover details for 2024 and estimated figures for 2025.

 

For your ready reference enclosing copies of the existing files in our records.

 

In addition to above also let us know if there are any material changes in operations or new acquisitions within this group.

 

Look forward to hearing from you.

 

Best Regards,

 

Uttam Khutale
Technical Manager – Agency

P.O. Box 26590, Dubai, UAE
